text: Dhadkan () is a Bollywood romantic drama movie directed by Dharmesh Darshan. The movie has Akshay Kumar, Shilpa Shetty, Sunil Shetty and Mahima Chaudhry in the main roles. The movie's music was done by Himanshu Jaykar & Nadeem- Shravan. == Cast == * Akshay Kumar ... Ram * Shilpa Shetty ... Anjali * Sunil Shetty ... Dev * Mahima Chaudhry ... Sheetal Varma * Sharmila Tagore ... Dev's mother (Special Appearance) * Sushma Seth ... Ram's stepmother * Parmeet Sethi ... Bob (Ram's stepbrother) * Manjeet Kullar ... Nikki (Ram's stepsister) * Kiran Kumar ... Anjali's father * Anjana Mumtaz ... Anjali's mother * Anupam Kher ... Sheetal's father (Special Appearance) * Kader Khan ... Singer (Special Appearance in song "Dulhe Ka Sehra") ==Soundtrack== The music of the movie went to become very popular of that year. It was also the second most sold Bollywood music album. Track # Title Singer(s) 1 "Dil Ne Yeh Kaha Hai Dil Se" Udit Narayan, Alka Yagnik and Kumar Sanu 2 "Tum Dil Ki Dhadkan Mein" Abhijeet, Alka Yagnik 3 "Dulhe Ka Sehra" Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan 4 "Dil Ne Yeh Kaha Hai Dil Se (II)" Sonu Nigam, Alka Yagnik 5 "Na Na Karte Pyar" Udit Narayan, Alka Yagnik 6 "Tum Dil Ki Dhadkan Mein (Sad)" Kumar Sanu 7 "Aksar Is Duniya Mein" Alka Yagnik == Awards == ;Filmfare Awards * Filmfare Best Female Playback Award - Alka Yagnik - "Dil Ne Yeh Kaha Hai Dil Se". * Filmfare Best Villain Award - Sunil Shetty == References == == Other websites == * Category:2000 movies Category:2000s Hindi-language movies Category:2000s Indian movies
title: Dhadkan
